extendedInfo.description: FREE Chicken pox treatment app.Chicken pox is a contagious disease which is caused by infection. It involves the appearance of rashes on the skin which become itchy and take a long time to heal. It spreads through coughing and sneezing. The symptoms are nausea, loss of appetite, and headache. It is very important to maintain good hygiene in order to treat chicken pox. It is also important not to scratch the itchy skin. Scratching increases the risk of infections. Some herbs, essential oils, vitamins, are effective in treating chicken pox. Homoeopathy has some good remedies for chicken pox.This app contains all information about chicken pox and its cure. This app covers topics like:* # Chickenpox overview* # Chickenpox Preventions* # Chickenpox Signs and Symptoms* # Chickenpox Diagnosis* # Chickenpox Treatment* # Chickenpox Complications* # Chickenpox infection after exposure* # Chickenpox during pregnancy* # Natural Home Remedies To Cure ChickenpoxIn other section of the app you can watch videos on "Tips to cure chicken pox naturally" & "Chicken pox home remedies".This app is useful for those people who are looking for infromation on chicken pox and it treatment. This app mentions some natural ways to cure chicken pox. People who are suffering from chicken pox and those who are looking for some treatments for chicken pox would find this app very helpful.So what are you waiting for??**Download Now**
